name: Blueberry Crumb Muffins
author: jacynth
summary: Perfect blueberry muffins with a sweet brown sugar crumb baked icing. Especially moist and lovely when served warm.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
In a large bowl, mix together the flour, white and brown sugars, salt, and baking powder
Stir in oil, eggs, and milk until well blended and very few lumps remain
Gently fold in blueberries being careful not to mash them
Fill muffin tins 2/3 full, or slightly more for a larger muffin top
For the crumb topping, mix together the flour, softened butter, cinnamon, and brown sugar
Place a small amount on top of each muffin
Bake muffins in the preheated oven for 20 to 30 minutes, or until a wooden skewer pierced in the center comes out clean and dry
